name: Stranded (itch) (Robonaut121)
description:
/// IMPORTANT: The browser version of the game does not appear to be loading. Use the download link below instead.

Please rate this game on https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/stranded-1 ! The support is appreciated :-)

You are stranded on a ship infested by aliens! To make things worse, you are also stuck in a time loop! You have three minutes to fix the engines and navigate the ship to safety.

Controls:

 - WASD to move

 - LMB for flashlight

 - E to interact with monitors

 - Watch out for the ruthless aliens!

// NOTE: There is no audio in this game. Please do not be alarmed if you don't hear anything.
